statements: SELECT * FROM student_grades;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE semester = 'Spring';
SELECT course_id, semester FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM student_grades ORDER BY semester DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B');
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE semester = 'Fall';
SELECT student_id, grade, course_id, semester FROM student_grades WHERE grade >= 'A';
SELECT COUNT(student_id) AS total_students FROM student_grades;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM student_grades ORDER BY grade DESC, semester ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, semester FROM student_grades WHERE semester IN ('Spring', 'Summer') ORDER BY course_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_grades;
SELECT student_id, grade, course_code FROM student_grades;
SELECT grade FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, transcript FROM student_transcripts WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT course_code, grade FROM student_grades WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT * FROM student_grades WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, course_code, grade FROM student_grades WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY course_code DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_code, grade FROM student_grades WHERE course_code IN ('MATH101', 'ENG202') AND grade = 'B';
SELECT student_id, transcript FROM student_transcripts WHERE LENGTH(transcript) > 500;
SELECT MAX(student_id) AS max_student_id, course_code FROM student_grades GROUP BY course_code ORDER BY max_student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE date_of_birth >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM Grades WHERE grade = 'A';

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id ORDER BY student_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Students WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT student_id, course_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id JOIN Courses ON Grades.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT Students.first_name, COUNT(Grades.grade) AS total_grades FROM Students LEFT JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id GROUP BY Students.student_id HAVING total_grades > 3;
SELECT course_name, AVG(CAST(grade AS INTEGER)) AS average_grade FROM Courses JOIN Grades ON Courses.course_id = Grades.course_id GROUP BY Courses.course_id HAVING AVG(CAST(grade AS INTEGER)) > 80;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM Courses;
SELECT student_name, grade_value FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT course_name, grade_date FROM Courses JOIN Transcripts ON Courses.course_id = Transcripts.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 2;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade_value FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade_value FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade_value >= 90;
SELECT * FROM students
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE age > 20
SELECT course_id, course_name, credit_hours FROM courses ORDER BY credit_hours DESC
SELECT student_id, student_name, course_id, grade FROM enrollments WHERE grade = 'A'
SELECT teacher_name, course_name FROM teachers JOIN courses ON teachers.course_id = courses.course_id
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE credit_hours >= 3 ORDER BY credit_hours ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, AVG(credit_hours) AS average_credit_hours FROM courses GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(credit_hours) > 2;

SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grade IN ('A', 'B') ORDER BY student_name, course_name ASC;
